item.title: Kat add a quote by Sarah Ockler
item.description: "Like the stars, fading with the halo of the vanishing moon. Like the ocean, falling and whispering against the shore. Nothing ever really goes away - it just changes into something else. Something beautiful." -- Sarah Ockler

item.title: Kat add a quote by Nicole Williams
item.description: "I’ll be here, each day and every day on, as long as you want me to be" -- Nicole Williams

item.title: Kat add a quote by Dennis Lehane
item.description: "We were supposed to grow old together, Dolores. Have kids. Take walks under old trees. I wanted to watch the lines etch themselves into your flesh and know when each and every one of them appeared. Die together." -- Dennis Lehane

item.title: Kat add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "The vampire is not a bad man, and he loves you" -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: Kat add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Things never happen the same way twice." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Kat add a quote by Xiaolu Guo
item.description: "Maybe I not need feeling lonely, because I can talk to other "me." Is like seeing my two pieces of lips speaking in two languages at same time. Yes, I not lonely, because I with another me. Like Austin Powers with his Mini Me" -- Xiaolu Guo

item.title: Kat add a quote by Jojo Moyes
Kat add a quote by Lauren Oliver
item.description: "Love: a single word, a wispy thing, a word no bigger or longer than an edge. That's what it is: an edge; a razor. It draws up through the center of your life, cutting everything in two. Before and after. The rest of the world falls away on either side." -- Lauren Oliver

item.title: Kat add a quote by David Levithan
item.description: "Trying to write about love is ultimately like trying to have a dictionary represent life. No matter how many words there are, there will never be enough." -- David Levithan

item.title: Kat add a quote by David Levithan
item.description:
"<b>basis</b>, <i>n</i>.
There has to be a moment at the beginning when you wonder whether you're in love with the person or in love with the feeling of love itself. If the moment doesn't pass, that's it - you're done. And if the moment does pass, it never goes that far. It stands in the distance, ready for whenever you want it back. Sometimes it's even there when you thought you were searching for something else, like an escape route, or your lover's face." -- David Levithan

item.title: Kat add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "You know, you could live a thousand lifetimes and not deserve him." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Kat add a quote by Tammara Webber
item.description: "Love is not the absence of logic but logic examined and recalculated heated and curved to fit inside the contours of the heart" -- Tammara Webber

item.title: Kat add a quote by Jamie McGuire
item.description: "I know we're fucked up, alright? I'm impulsive, and hot tempered, and you get under my skin like no one else. You act like you hate me one minute, and then need me the next. I never get anything right, and I don't deserve you...but I fucking love you, Abby. I love you more than I loved anyone or anything ever. When you're around, I don't need booze, or money, or the fighting, or the one-night stands..." -- Jamie McGuire

item.title: Kat add a quote by Jamie McGuire
item.description: "I belong to my beloved, and my beloved is mine." -- Jamie McGuire

item.title: Kat add a quote by S.C. Stephens
item.description: "Dude, he's Australian...not a pirate." -- S.C. Stephens

item.title: Kat add a quote by S.C. Stephens
item.description: "He said I was his heart, and you don’t leave your heart behind. You can’t live without your heart." -- S.C. Stephens

item.title: Kat add a quote by Nicole Williams
item.description: "It always amazes me how when we’re sure we’ve lost something for good, it winds up finding us." -- Nicole Williams

item.title: Kat add a quote by Nicole Williams
item.description: "Our reputations weren’t who we really were, they were who people told us we were. Some of us fell into that trap, while others fought their entire lives to break free of them. Jude was no more the bad boy with a dead end future than I was the skanky slut everyone said I was." -- Nicole Williams

item.title: Kat add a quote by Leah Spiegel
Kat add a quote by Leah Spiegel
item.description: "Joie," he said with his lips hovering over mine. "What?" I felt my heart flutter. "Shut up," he muttered and then he kissed me." -- Leah Spiegel

item.title: Kat add a quote by Tarryn Fisher
item.description: "You can only give your heart away once, after that, everything else will chase your first love" -- Tarryn Fisher

item.title: Kat add a quote by Tarryn Fisher
item.description: "I think that after the first time you give your heart away, you never get it back. The rest of your life is just you pretending that you still have a heart." -- Tarryn Fisher

item.title: Kat add a quote by Tarryn Fisher
item.description: "The kiss. The kiss. The kiss. It was chocolate cake and fizzy passion and goose bumps. No one had ever kissed me like that." -- Tarryn Fisher

item.title: Kat add a quote by Tarryn Fisher
item.description: "I hated it when literally was used for non-literal things. I popped the tab on my soda can and returned her grin. Over my dead body... literally." -- Tarryn Fisher

item.title: Kat add a quote by Diane Duane
item.description: "Reading one book is like eating one potato chip." -- Diane Duane

item.title: Kat add a quote by Nora Ephron
item.description: "Above all, be the heroine of your life, not the victim." -- Nora Ephron

item.title: Kat add a quote by Nora Ephron
item.description: "Reading is everything. Reading makes me feel like I've accomplished something, learned something, become a better person. Reading makes me smarter. Reading gives me something to talk about later on. Reading is the unbelievably healthy way my attention deficit disorder medicates itself. Reading is escape, and the opposite of escape; it's a way to make contact with reality after a day of making things up, and it's a way of making contact with someone else's imagination after a day that's all too real. Reading is grist. Reading is bliss." -- Nora Ephron

item.title: Kat add a quote by Isaac Marion
item.description: "I want to change my punctuation. I long for exclamation marks, but I'm drowning in ellipses." -- Isaac Marion

item.title: Kat add a quote by Isaac Marion
item.description: "There is a chasm between me and the world outside of me. A gap so wide my feelings can't cross it. By the time my screams reach the other side, they have dwindled into groans." -- Isaac Marion

item.title: Kat add a quote by Jennifer L. Armentrout
item.description: "Beautiful face. Beautiful body. Horrible attitude. It was the holy trinity of hot boys." -- Jennifer L. Armentrout
